entry_pattern: Identifies completed Wyckoff Accumulation/Distribution. Phase C: Entry after Spring/UTAD + Secondary Test (ST) + LTF CHoCH, into FVG/OB. Phase D/E: Entry on low-volume pullback to Last Point of Support/Supply (LPS/LPSY) after Sign of Strength/Weakness (SOS/SOW), or on BoS retest.
entry_conditions: Clear HTF Wyckoff schematic (Accumulation/Distribution, Phase C/D/E events).
Phase C: Valid Spring/UTAD (sweep + rejection + volume) & successful low-volume ST & LTF CHoCH.
Phase D/E: Valid SOS/SOW (breakout + volume) & low-volume pullback to LPS/LPSY.
Entry at fresh FVG/OB (Phase C) or confirmed LPS/LPSY.
confluence_conditions_indicators: Volume Signatures (Spring/UTAD rejection, ST low volume, SOS/SOW high volume, LPS/LPSY test low volume)
Session Timing (London/NY often decisive for phase transitions)

risk_model.sl_description: Below Spring low/ST low (Phase C) or below LPS/above LPSY (Phase D/E), + adaptive buffer (ATR, tick volatility, spread).
risk_model.tp_description: Initial: TR resistance/support (creek/ice). Subsequent: P&F projections from TR, or opposing HTF POI/liquidity.

execution_flow_ispts: Catalyst (LiquidityEngine.py for Spring/UTAD or StructureValidator.py for SOS/SOW)
Confirmation (StructureValidator.py for CHoCH or test validation)

scoring.description: Score based on clarity of Wyckoff events/phases, volume signatures, CHoCH/BoS strength, FVG/POI/LPS/LPSY quality. Tick-level micro-Wyckoff patterns can enhance.

fallback_logic.description: If ST fails, CHoCH doesn't occur, LPS/LPSY fails, or markup/markdown lacks volume, agent monitors for re-tests, potential breakdown, or awaits stronger BoS.

agent_profiles_conceptual: Wyckoff-specialist agent YAMLs based on new.zip, StrategyPassV3_Tier3.zip
